title: Bug 47910: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: The ajc compiler is not including the METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside the resulting jar file.
OB: When using the ajc compiler with the outjar option, the resulting jar file does not contain the METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file that should be included.
EB: The ajc compiler should include the METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside the resulting jar file when the outjar option is used.
SR: The ajc compiler should generate a valid jar file with the MANIFEST.MF file when the outjar parameter is used.
